text: More great Apple deals are on tap from Amazon today, including big discounts on AirPods and Apple Watch Series 10. Let’s take a look! AirPods 4 are on sale for just $99, cutting 22% off the $129 retail price. These are wildly popular headphones for a reason, and not just because of the iconic stylish design of the wireless earbuds. AirPods 4 include features like gesture support, Spatial Audio, voice isolation for phone calls, water resistance, sweat resistance, Siri commands, and a USB-C charging case. Get AirPods 4 for $99 (down 22% from $129) AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $169 (down from $249) AirPods Pro 2 include high-end features like hearing aid functionality, high fidelity sound, active noise cancellation, water resistance, sweat resistance, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, ear detection, Siri commands, and a USB-C charging case. AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249) Apple Watch Series 10 – $299 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 features an always-on 42mm display, excellent fitness and activity tracking features, a heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support for one handed operation, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more. Right now Amazon is taking 25% off the retail price, so check out the different color and band options to find the model you like. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $299 (down from $399 MSRP) AirTags 4-pack – $70 (down from $99) AirTags offer a fantastic and simple way to track things with the excellent Find My network, whether you’re watching your luggage, a purple, briefcase, package, luggage, backpack, cat, dog, bicycle, scooter, or whatever else you might want to track. AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
More great Apple deals are on tap from Amazon today, including big discounts on AirPods and Apple Watch Series 10. Let’s take a look!

AirPods 4 are on sale for just $99, cutting 22% off the $129 retail price. These are wildly popular headphones for a reason, and not just because of the iconic stylish design of the wireless earbuds. AirPods 4 include features like gesture support, Spatial Audio, voice isolation for phone calls, water resistance, sweat resistance, Siri commands, and a USB-C charging case.

  • Get AirPods 4 for $99 (down 22% from $129)

AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $169 (down from $249)

AirPods Pro 2 include high-end features like hearing aid functionality, high fidelity sound, active noise cancellation, water resistance, sweat resistance, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, ear detection, Siri commands, and a USB-C charging case.

  • AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $299 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 features an always-on 42mm display, excellent fitness and activity tracking features, a heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support for one handed operation, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more. Right now Amazon is taking 25% off the retail price, so check out the different color and band options to find the model you like.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $299 (down from $399 MSRP)

AirTags 4-pack – $70 (down from $99)

AirTags offer a fantastic and simple way to track things with the excellent Find My network, whether you’re watching your luggage, a purple, briefcase, package, luggage, backpack, cat, dog, bicycle, scooter, or whatever else you might want to track.

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
